name: HarryPotterJokes
0:
”Alexa, ask Harry Potter Jokes”
”Alexa, open Harry Potter Jokes”
”Alexa, start Harry Potter Jokes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: harry potter jokes
des:
Harry Potter Jokes is a great skill that can be used to kill time, or just for some good-natured entertainment.

This app is mainly for Harry Potter fans but can be used by others too. Just say "Alexa, ask Harry Potter Jokes, and it will get it up and running. Hope to see you playing, "wizards"!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
